Project.Brief history of your project and organi: The Cal-Adapt: Analytics Engine (AE) enables access to a wide variety of data. There are multiple methods to access data that depend on individual goals and technical expertise. The Data Catalog meets strict metadata standards and receives regular updates as new sources of climate data become available on the AE.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: Downscaled future and historical climate projections for California and her environs in support of California's Fifth Climate Assessment
Project.How do you plan to prepare the dataset: I will first download the dataset and categorize the content. I will use the built-in tools officially provided by Lotus (the reference implementation of Filecoin) to segment, compress, and package the data, and then distribute the data to SPs.
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Asia other than Greater China, North America, South America, Europe
